info.title: Supplement Management API
info.description: API documentation for the Supplement Management System

password.description: User password, at least 8 characters long

lastActive.description: Timestamp of the user's last activity

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to the user profile

patientProfile.description: Patient's specific profile data, if user is a patient

id.description: Unique identifier for the patient profile

userId.description: ID of the associated user account for this patient profile

name.description: Full name of the patient (can be different from User name if needed)

contactEmail.description: Contact email address for the patient (can be different from User login email)

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the patient

primaryConsultant.description: Primary consultant assigned to this patient profile

primaryConsultantId.description: ID of the primary assigned consultant

lastVisit.description: Date of the patient's last visit

totalSpent.description: Total amount spent by the patient (calculated from purchases)

refreshToken.description: Refresh token used to obtain a new access token

accessToken.description: New access token generated after successful refresh

visibleToAll.description: Whether the item is visible to all consultants by default

visibleToSpecificConsultantIds.description: Array of consultant IDs if item visibility is restricted (used if visibleToAll is false)

id.description: Unique identifier for the inventory item

description.example: Vitamin C for audit log testing - updated description

visibleToAll.description: Indicates if the item is visible to all consultants by default

visibleToSpecificConsultants.description: Array of consultant IDs this item is specifically visible to (if visibleToAll is false). Transformed from User[] relation on serialization.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the item was created

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to the item

example.name: AuditTest Vitamin C (Updated)
example.description: Vitamin C for audit log testing - updated description

data.description: Array of inventory items for the current page

id.description: ID of the most sold item

name.description: Name of the most sold item

quantity.description: Total quantity sold (or current stock, clarify logic)

totalItems.description: Total number of distinct inventory items

totalValue.description: Total value of current inventory (Price with VAT * Quantity)

totalValueWithoutVAT.description: Total value of current inventory (Price without VAT * Quantity)

lowStockItems.description: Number of items currently considered low stock

mostSoldItems.description: List of most sold items (exact structure depends on implementation)

recentRestocks.description: List of recent restock events (exact structure depends on implementation)

quantity.description: Quantity to add to the stock. Must be a positive number.

notes.description: Optional notes for the restock operation
notes.example: Received new shipment from supplier X

visibleToAll.description: Set to true if the item should be visible to all, false if visibility is restricted by specific consultant IDs.

visibleToSpecificConsultantIds.description: Array of consultant IDs who can see this item. Used when visibleToAll is false. Send an empty array to make it visible to no specific consultants (if visibleToAll is also false).

name.description: Full name for the patient's account and profile

email.description: Login email address for the patient's user account

password.description: Password for the patient's user account (min 8 characters)

dateOfBirth.description: Patient's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format

primaryConsultantId.description: ID of the primary consultant assigned to this patient (optional at creation)

totalSpent.description: Total amount spent by the patient (placeholder)

patientCount.description: Number of patients assigned to this consultant

newPatientsThisMonth.description: Number of new patients registered this month

patientsByConsultant.description: Breakdown of patient counts by consultant

data.description: Array of patient records for the current page

name.description: Patient's full name for the profile

dateOfBirth.description: Patient's date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format

primaryConsultantId.description: ID of the new primary consultant for this patient (Admin only)

id.description: Unique identifier for the purchase item line

purchaseId.description: ID of the parent purchase (often redundant if nested)

inventoryItem.description: Details of the purchased inventory item

inventoryItemId.description: ID of the purchased inventory item

priceAtPurchase.description: Price per unit at the time of purchase

vatRateAtPurchase.description: VAT rate (%) at the time of purchase

subTotal.description: Subtotal for this line item (price * quantity with VAT)

patientProfile.description: Patient profile who made the purchase

data.description: Array of purchase records for the current page

id.description: Unique identifier for the appointment product item

inventoryItemId.description: ID of the associated inventory item

inventoryItem.description: Details of the associated inventory item

quantity.description: Quantity of the item for this appointment

priceAtTimeOfBooking.description: Price of one unit at the time of booking

vatRateAtTimeOfBooking.description: VAT rate at the time of booking

patientProfileId.description: ID of the patient for this appointment

consultantId.description: ID of the consultant for this appointment

date.description: Date and time of the appointment

totalPrice.description: Total price of the appointment including products

data.description: Array of appointment records for the current page

inventoryItemId.description: ID of the inventory item being purchased

quantity.description: Quantity of the item being purchased, must be at least 1

consultantId.description: Consultant's ID who made the sale

purchaseDate.description: Date of purchase in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to current date if not provided.

items.description: Array of items included in the purchase. Must contain at least one item.

id.description: Unique identifier for the purchase record (either Purchase ID or AppointmentProductItem ID)

sourceType.description: Indicates the source of the purchase

sourceId.description: Identifier of the source entity (Purchase ID or Appointment ID)

date.description: Date of the purchase or appointment

inventoryItem.description: Details of the purchased inventory item

price.description: Price per unit at the time of purchase/booking

vatRate.description: VAT rate at the time of purchase/booking

inventoryItemId.description: ID of the inventory item (product) sold during the appointment

date.description: Date and time of the appointment in ISO 8601 format

notes.example: Patient needs to discuss test results.

products.description: Optional array of products sold during the appointment.

consultantId.description: ID of the consultant for the appointment.

startAt.description: Start date and time of the appointment in ISO 8601 format (UTC).

title.description: Title of the calendar event (e.g., Patient Name - Appointment Type)

start.description: Start date and time of the appointment in ISO 8601 format

end.description: End date and time of the appointment in ISO 8601 format

status.description: The new status for the appointment

description.description: Optional description of the appointment type
description.example: First meeting with a new patient.

durationMinutes.description: Duration of the appointment in minutes

visibleToAll.description: Whether this appointment type is visible to all consultants by default

visibleToSpecificConsultantIds.description: Array of consultant IDs if appointment type visibility is restricted (used if visibleToAll is false)

id.description: Unique identifier for the working hours entry

userId.description: ID of the user (consultant/admin) these working hours belong to

startTime.description: Start time of the working interval

endTime.description: End time of the working interval

entries.description: An array of working hours entries for different days/times. Replaces all existing working hours for the user.

startAt.description: Start time of the available slot in ISO 8601 format.

endAt.description: End time of the available slot in ISO 8601 format.

role.description: Role of the user. For this endpoint, typically 'consultant' or 'admin'.

visible.description: Whether the item is visible to the consultant

inventoryItemIds.description: Array of inventory item IDs to be made visible to the consultant. Replaces existing specific visibilities.

id.description: The ID of the appointment type

name.description: The name of the appointment type

visible.description: Whether the appointment type is visible to the consultant

appointmentTypeIds.description: An array of appointment type IDs that should be visible to the consultant.

count.description: Number of appointments of this type

date.description: Date and time of the appointment

totalPatients.description: Total number of patients assigned to the consultant

totalAppointments.description: Total number of appointments conducted by the consultant

totalRevenue.description: Total revenue generated from the consultant's appointments
